mapper.select: select * from t_task_info where taskpk in (${value})

select * from t_task_info
and taskid like '%${taskid}%'
and createtime+0 >= #{datefrom}+0
and createtime+0 <= #{dateto}+0
order by taskpk+0 desc

select * from t_task_info
and taskstate in (${taskstate})
and taskdate+0 < DATE_FORMAT(#{before},'%Y%m%d')+0
and taskdate+0 >= DATE_FORMAT(#{allocationdate},'%Y%m%d')+0
SELECT a.* FROM t_task_info a LEFT JOIN t_task_detailinfo b ON a.taskid=b.taskid WHERE a.taskstate=#{taskstate} AND b.taskstate='23'
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_task_info (taskid, tasktype, taskkeynum, taskurl, tasktitle, taskwirelesstitle, taskstartdate, taskenddate, taskdate, taskreleasekeyword, taskkeyword, taskhourcounts, taskprice, taskminprice, taskmaxprice, shipaddress, tasksearchType, creativetitle, taskimgztc, taskimgpt, flowcount, Collectioncount, Shoppingcount, storecollectioncount, fakechatcount, fakechatstr1, fakechatstr2, fakechatstr3, fakechatstr4, deepclick, tasktmallapppct, taskgprspct, taskPlus, taskduration, iscreativetitle, subtractpoints, taskstate, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser ) values (#{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskkeynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskwirelesstitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskstartdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskreleasekeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskkeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskhourcounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskminprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskmaxprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasksearchtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creativetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskimgztc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskimgpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectioncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoppingcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storecollectioncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fakechatcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fakechatstr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fakechatstr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fakechatstr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fakechatstr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deepclick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktmallapppct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskgprspct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskplus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskduration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscreativetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtractpoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task_info SET deepclick='0' WHERE taskid=#{taskid}
mapper.delete: delete from t_task_info where taskpk in (${value})
